---
title: Vendor Getting Started
description: Getting started guide for CurryDash restaurant vendors
---

# Getting Started as a Vendor

Welcome to CurryDash! This guide will help you set up your restaurant on our platform.

## Prerequisites

- Vendor account credentials
- Access to seller.currydash.com

## First Steps

1. Log in to the Seller Portal
2. Complete your restaurant profile
3. Add your menu items

## Next Steps

- [Seller Portal Overview](/vendors/seller-portal)
- [Menu Management](/vendors/menu-management)
- [Order Management](/vendors/orders)
